data.title: Discover the Beauty of Nuku Hiva with Far and Away Adventures
data.meta_description: Located in the Bay of Taioha’e, Pension He'e Tai Inn Nuku Hiva offers 7 spacious rooms with a bar. Also admire local art in the nearby Marquesan art gallery.
data.text:
Small recent structure of 7 rooms and 1 suite, spread over 2 floors, with a bar-restaurant. Located in the Bay of Taioha’e, the Pension He’e Tai Inn faces a black sand beach and is located not far from a grocery store. The rooms are spacious, bright, comfortable and all have a terrace and small mosquito screens on windows.

Additional advantage: the guest houses the museum and the Marquesan art gallery of the village, where you can admire the fine works of local artisans.

The restaurant and bar of the guest house are located in another building, separated from the rooms. The restaurant is bright. Individual tables are scattered around the room.

Continental breakfast is included in the room rate. It offers coffee or tea, bread, butter and jam, fruit juice. Eggs on supplement on location.

The restaurant is opened: Breakfast from 07h00 – 08h30 Lunch from 11h00 – 13h30 Dinner from 18h00 – 21h00.

The bar is daily opened: 18h00 – 21h00.

No conference room .

Information on this fact sheet is subject to change without prior notice.

This establishment belongs to the official category of “guesthouses & family hotels”. The classification of these lodges has been set in order to clearly differentiate them from the ”international hotels and residences” category, based on the following key elements

– A limited number of furnished units, generally located close to the family home

– Facilities tailored to domestic standards, different from the international tourist hotels criteria

– Restricted catering, reception, and housekeeping service

– Limited staff, both in terms of numbers and professional training

– Reduced taxes Thus, any restrictive diets, special physical conditions, arrival/departure outside of regular Check In and Check Out hours must be communicated to us before the reservation is made, and are subject to the approval of the establishment. While it is true that the level of comfort can not be compared to that of an international hotel, the commitment to hospitality remains nevertheless professional.

Accepted credit cards : Visa, Mastercard

Warning! There is no bank nor ATM on the island. We highly recommend to bring some local currency (XPF) for your extra expenses.
